addBuffer(uint256).details: Only callable by the lendgine, this is liquidity that is withdrawn from the lendgine but not the pair

params.amount: The amount of liquidity shares to add

balances().details: Not to be relied upon anywhere else because of a potential readonly reentracy

params.liquidity: The amount of liquidity shares to burn
params.to: The address to receive the underlying balances

mint(uint256).details: This assumes the amount of each token that is to be deposited has already been sent to this contract prior to invoking this function

params.liquidity: The amount of liquidity shares requested

removeBuffer(uint256).details: Only callable by the lendgine, this is takes liquidity that was minted in the pair and deposits it to the lendgine

params.amount: The amount of liquidity shares to remove

swap(address,uint256,uint256).details: The tokens that are to be sent to be sent in for the swap are required this contract before the invocation of this function

params.amount0Out: The amount of `base` tokens requested out of the trade
params.amount1Out: The amount of `speculative` tokens requested out of the trade
params.to: The address to receive the output of the trade

returns.valid: Whether or not the invariant passed

addBuffer(uint256).notice: Adds liquidity shares to the buffer

balances().notice: Returns the `base` and `speculative` balances of the pool

base().notice: The base token of the pair

baseScaleFactor().notice: The scale of the base token

buffer().notice: The amount of tokens that are currently unowned by the `lendgine`

burn(address,uint256).notice: Destroy a liquidity providing position and receive the underlying balances

factory().notice: The contract that deployed the pair

lendgine().notice: The associated lending market for these liquidity shares

removeBuffer(uint256).notice: Removes liquidity shares from the buffer

speculative().notice: The speculative token of the pair

speculativeScaleFactor().notice: The scale of the speculative token

swap(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Exchange between the `base` and `speculative` tokens, either accepts or rejects the proposed trade

totalSupply().notice: The total supply of CFMM shares

upperBound().notice: The upper price limit of the CFMM, the exchange rate offered by this pool will never exceed this value

verifyInvariant(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Verifies that the given amounts satisfy the trading invariant
